column1: The config file option 'submit' was used.
For peak benchmarks that used 2048 MPI ranks, four ranks were assigned
to each CPU die, leaving two cores per die idle.
In the base run, each MPI job is assigned to a topologically compact
set of nodes, i.e. the minimal needed number of switches was
used for each job: 1 switch for up to 192 ranks, 2 switches
